body.name: COOFANDY Men's Linen Short Sleeve Button Down Shirt Casual Cuban Collar Summer Beach Shirts Vacation Essentials
features: 【HIGH-QUALITY LINEN FABRIC】Coofandy summer linen short sleeve button down beach essentials shirt, crafted with superior linen and mixture material. Soft, lightweight, breathable, refreshing, skin-friendly, wrinkle free and no ironing required, refined look. This button up short sleeve shirt combines the coolness of linen with the softness of rayon for a premium, skin-friendly experience.

【LAID-BACK ELEGANCE】Coofandy cruise ship essentials linen fashion shirts features a regular fit for effortless comfort. Short sleeve, button down closure, Cuban collar, solid color, double chest pockets. Cut for comfort yet designed to flatter, our vacation essentials beach casual button-down shirt’s relaxed fit doesn't compromise on style, ensuring you look sharp whether at work or play.

【EVERYDAY VERSATILITY】Mens beach Cuban collar shirt could be easy to match with linen shorts/pants, trousers, jacket or jeans to create a simple but fashionable style. These summer no tuck big and tall shirts are great either solo buttoned up or worn unbuttoned over a form fitting t-shirt/tank. Whether you're dressing for a casual business meeting or a weekend getaway, the lightweight wedding untucked shirt suits all your needs.

【OCCASIONS】Daily casual, office, school, wedding, camping, travel, yoga, date, beach, party. Ideal for a myriad of occasions, the camp collar chambray untucked hemp shirt effortlessly transitions from business casual to leisure, giving you a confident edge wherever you go.

【EASY CARE】 Machine wash, cold gentle, drip flat drying in the shade. Please read our size chart of the product description to choose your own size before order our novelty short sleeve linen dress shirts.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: COOFANDY Men's Linen Button Down Shirt Casual Cuban Collar Summer Beach Shirt Step into our sanctuary of style, where every linen button down Cuban collar shirt is a testament to linen's timeless appeal. With its natural luster and superior weave, our linen shirts are a sartorial nod to classic elegance infused with modern sensibility！
Durability in Design Experience the enduring quality of linen; our shirts are built to last. Resistant to wear and tear, they're a wardrobe investment that pays dividends in style and longevity.

Tailored for the Modern Man The lightweight fashion shirt gently provides a tailored silhouette, perfect for pairing with chinos or linen shorts. It's a staple piece that complements your wardrobe with its timeless solid color and effortless style!

Unparalleled Quality丨Comfort and Fashion-Focused Fit Our commitment to quality is unwavering. We use only the finest grade linen, meticulously woven to provide a balance of lightweight breathability and durable wear. Quality isn't a luxury; it's our standard.

Unparalleled Quality丨Crafted Excellence Cuban Collar Featuring a classic Cuban collar and double chest pockets, this short-sleeved shirt balances casual charm with functional design. Button Down Closure Ideal for a myriad of occasions, it effortlessly transitions from business casual to leisure, giving you a confident edge wherever you go. Gentle on Skin The hypoallergenic nature of our linen ensures it's as gentle on your skin as it is on the environment. We stand against the itch and discomfort. Linen's Loomed Luxury COOFANDY new linen shirts redefine sophistication with their superior linen blend — a material celebrated for its exceptional coolness and freshness.

Consistency in Care Our linen short sleeve shirts are engineered to resist shrinkage. The integrity of the fabric remains intact through every laundry cycle, promising a lasting fit and enduring elegance！

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfort and class
reviews.reviewText: I bought this shirt for my fiancée. It's perfect. The material , the length it's just perfect. True to size. You can wear it to the beach, you can wear it to the restaurant. Very well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks great and fits great. Would buy again from this seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good looking casual summer linen shirt.
reviews.reviewText: The COOFANDY Men's Linen Short Sleeve Button Down Shirt is a bargain at this current sale price. It is comfortable and looks good. The collar is a little small but that is the style of this shirt. It is ideal for many summers casual activities. The linen has that classic casual summer vibe. I have several COOFANDY garments, and they have a south American/Caribbean appearance. I have been satisfied with most all their garments. If you are looking for a fresh summer look you really can’t go wrong at this price.Positives:• Handsome• Great price• ComfortableNegatives:• Collar design may not be to your liking.Overall, I like this shirt and would recommend it to anyone looking for that summer look. It is a nice shirt at a good price and represents good value.I hope this review was helpful in you making a purchase decision.4 Stars------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------My star rating system:All ratings by vine members are subjective, that said, I try to be as honest and objective as I can and I rate on a scale from 1 to 5 stars the combined function, build quality and price (value) of the item being reviewed. 1 STAR: Completely unusable, not as advertised, not functional. Would request a refund. Not recommended. 2 STAR: Meets minimum functionality but cheaply made, unlikely to last. Wouldn't purchase it again. Not excited about this item. Not recommended. 3 STAR: Does what it should but not overly impressed. May be overpriced or have some cheap build elements. Mildly Recommend. It's OK. 4 STAR: Good solid product, possibly with a minor issue or slightly overpriced. I like it, would purchase it again and recommend it. 5 STAR: Completely meets or exceeds my expectations. High quality, good value for the price. I would purchase it again. Would strongly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the shirt. Very happy with the quality and look!

reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is not linen
reviews.reviewText: I was so disappointed when I received this shirt. I had specifically purchased it because it said it was linen. It is 70% rayon, 30% linen. Very disappointing.
